archives.name: Contract distribution per year

arguments: Contract distribution per month for year {{year}}

archives.query: SELECT (?year as ?label) (COUNT (?contract) as ?count) WHERE {?contract a grz-owl:Contract . ?contract sem:hasTimeStamp ?date . BIND (year(?date) AS ?year). } GROUP BY ?year

subplots.name: Contract distribution per month for year {{year}}

arguments: Contract distribution per day for {{month}}th month {{year}}

subplots.query: SELECT ?label (count(?contract) as ?count) WHERE {?contract a grz-owl:Contract . ?contract sem:hasTimeStamp ?date . BIND (year(?date) AS ?year) . FILTER (?year = {{year}}) . BIND(month(?date) as ?label)} GROUP BY ?label ORDER BY asc(?label)

subplots.name: Contract distribution per day for {{month}}th month {{year}}
subplots.query: SELECT ?label (count(?contract) as ?count) WHERE {?contract a grz-owl:Contract . ?contract sem:hasTimeStamp ?date . BIND (year(?date) AS ?year) . BIND (month(?date) as ?month) FILTER (?year = {{year}}) . FILTER(?month = {{month}}) . BIND(day(?date) as ?label)} GROUP BY ?label ORDER BY asc(?label)

archives.name: Contract distribution per register
archives.query: SELECT ?label (count(?contract) as ?count) WHERE {?label a grz-owl:Register ; grz-owl:has_document ?contract . } GROUP BY ?label

archives.name: Page distribution per year

arguments: Page distribution per month for year {{year}}

archives.query: SELECT (?year as ?label) (count(?folia) as ?count) WHERE {?reg a grz-owl:Register . ?reg grz-owl:has_folia ?folia . ?reg grz-owl:has_document ?contract . ?contract a grz-owl:Contract  . ?contract sem:hasTimeStamp ?date . BIND (year(?date) AS ?year). } GROUP BY ?year

subplots.name: Page distribution per month for year {{year}}

arguments: Page distribution per day for {{month}}th month {{year}}
Page distribution per day for {{month}}th month {{year}}

subplots.query: SELECT ?label (count(?folia) as ?count) WHERE {?reg a grz-owl:Register . ?reg grz-owl:has_folia ?folia . ?reg grz-owl:has_document ?contract . ?contract a grz-owl:Contract  . ?contract sem:hasTimeStamp ?date . BIND (year(?date) AS ?year) . FILTER (?year = {{year}}) . BIND(month(?date) as ?label)} GROUP BY ?label ORDER BY asc(?label)

subplots.name: Page distribution per day for {{month}}th month {{year}}
subplots.query: SELECT ?label (count(?folia) as ?count) WHERE {?reg a grz-owl:Register . ?reg grz-owl:has_folia ?folia . ?reg grz-owl:has_document ?contract . ?contract a grz-owl:Contract . ?contract sem:hasTimeStamp ?date . BIND (year(?date) AS ?year) . BIND(month(?date) as ?month) . FILTER (?year = {{year}}) . FILTER(?month = {{month}}) BIND(day(?date) as ?label)} GROUP BY ?label ORDER BY asc(?label)

archives.name: Page distribution per register
archives.query: SELECT ?label (count(?contract) as ?count) WHERE {?label a grz-owl:Register ; grz-owl:has_document ?contract . } GROUP BY ?label

people.name: How many times person entity are mentioned?
people.query: SELECT COUNT (distinct ?pe) AS ?count ?mentionCount AS ?label WHERE { SELECT ?pe COUNT (distinct ?pm) AS ?mentionCount WHERE  {?pm grz-owl:hasEntityLink ?link . ?pe a grz-owl:Person . ?link  grz-owl:refers_to ?pe. } GROUP BY ?pe } GROUP BY ?mentionCount ORDER BY ASC (?mentionCount)

people.name: Person entity role distribution
people.query: SELECT ?label COUNT (distinct ?pm) as ?count WHERE {?pm a grz-owl:Person . ?pm grz-owl:role/grz-owl:value ?label . } GROUP BY ?label

people.name: Women role distribution
people.query: SELECT ?label COUNT (distinct ?p) AS ?count WHERE { ?p a grz-owl:Person . ?p grz-owl:role ?roleStmt . ?p grz-owl:gender "F"^^<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string> . ?roleStmt grz-owl:value/grz-owl:roleType ?roleType .  BIND ((strafter(str(?roleType), "ontology#") AS ?label))} GROUP BY ?label

people.name: Men role distribution
people.query: SELECT ?label COUNT (distinct ?p) AS ?count WHERE { ?p a grz-owl:Person . ?p grz-owl:role ?roleStmt . ?p grz-owl:gender "M"^^<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string> . ?roleStmt grz-owl:value/grz-owl:roleType ?roleType .  BIND ((strafter(str(?roleType), "ontology#") AS ?label))} GROUP BY ?label

people.name: Top mentioned persons
people.query: SELECT ?person ?label (count(distinct ?pm) as ?count) WHERE {?pm a grz-owl:PersonMention ; grz-owl:hasEntityLink ?link . ?link grz-owl:refers_to ?person . ?person a grz-owl:Person ; rdfs:label ?label . } GROUP BY ?person ?label ORDER BY desc(?count)

people.name: Top masters by number of apprentices
people.query: SELECT (?master as ?label) (COUNT (distinct ?appStatement) as ?count) WHERE {?master grz-owl:has_apprentice ?appStatement . } GROUP BY ?master ORDER BY DESC(?count)

people.name: Age distribution for apprentices
people.query: SELECT (COUNT (distinct ?app) as ?count) (?age as ?label) WHERE {?app  a grz-owl:PersonMention . ?app grz-owl:role/grz-owl:roleType  grz-owl:apprentice . ?app grz-owl:age ?age . } GROUP BY ?age ORDER BY ASC (?age)

people.name: Age distribution for apprentices; category "stampa"
people.query: SELECT (COUNT (distinct ?app) as ?count) (?age as ?label) WHERE {?app  a grz-owl:PersonMention . ?app grz-owl:role/grz-owl:roleType  grz-owl:apprentice . ?app grz-owl:age ?age . ?app grz-owl:profession/grz-owl:professionCategory "stampa" .} GROUP BY ?age ORDER BY ASC (?age)

people.name: Gender distribution for apprentices
people.query: SELECT (COUNT (distinct ?app) as ?count) (?gender as ?label) WHERE {?app  a grz-owl:Person . ?app grz-owl:role/grz-owl:value/grz-owl:roleType  grz-owl:apprentice . ?app grz-owl:gender ?gender . } GROUP BY ?gender

people.name: Top mentioned apprentices
people.query: SELECT (?app as ?label) (COUNT (distinct ?link) as ?count) WHERE {?app  a grz-owl:Person . ?app grz-owl:role/grz-owl:value/grz-owl:roleType  grz-owl:apprentice . ?app grz-owl:has_mention ?link . ?link grz-owl:isEntityLinkOf ?appMention . ?appMention grz-owl:role/grz-owl:roleType  grz-owl:apprentice . } GROUP BY ?app HAVING  COUNT (distinct ?link) > 1

people.name: Top-10 guarantors by number of apprentices
people.query: SELECT STR(?l) AS ?label (COUNT (distinct ?app) as ?count) WHERE {?g  a grz-owl:Person . ?g grz-owl:role/grz-owl:value/grz-owl:roleType  grz-owl:guarantor . ?g grz-owl:has_apprentice ?app . ?g rdfs:label ?l} GROUP BY ?l ORDER BY DESC (COUNT (distinct ?app)) LIMIT 10

economics.name: Which charge to which frequency?
economics.query: SELECT (COUNT (?c) as ?count) (str(?wf) as ?label) WHERE {?c a grz-owl:ChargeMention . ?c grz-owl:writtenForm ?wf . } GROUP BY (str(?wf))

economics.name: Who pays the salary?
economics.query: SELECT (?payer as ?label) (COUNT (distinct ?sal) as ?count) WHERE {?sal a grz-owl:Salary . ?sal grz-owl:Â§By ?payer . } GROUP BY (?payer)

economics.name: Progressive (1) vs. non-progressive (0) salaries
economics.query: SELECT COUNT (distinct ?sal) AS ?count ?prog AS ?label WHERE  {  ?sal a grz-owl:Salary .  ?sal grz-owl:progressive ?prog .}

economics.name: In good (1) vs. in money (0) salaries
economics.query: SELECT COUNT (distinct ?sal) AS ?count ?label WHERE { ?sal a grz-owl:Salary .  ?sal grz-owl:inGood ?label .}

economics.name: In which profession the salary is paid by the apprentice?
economics.query: SELECT (?profSF as ?label) (COUNT (distinct ?sal) as ?count) WHERE {?c grz-owl:reports ?finCond . ?finCond grz-owl:hasConditionComponent ?sal . ?sal a grz-owl:Salary . ?sal grz-owl:paidBy "Apprentice". ?c grz-owl:introduces ?master . ?master grz-owl:role/grz-owl:roleType grz-owl:master . ?master grz-owl:profession/grz-owl:standardForm  ?profSF . } GROUP BY (?profSF)

economics.name: How many contracts with which type of financial conditions?
economics.query: SELECT (?type as ?label) (COUNT (distinct ?c) as ?count) WHERE {?c grz-owl:reports ?finCond . ?finCond grz-owl:hasConditionComponent ?cc . ?cc rdf:type ?type . } GROUP BY (?type)

economics.name: Contract distribution per profession
economics.query: SELECT (?profSF as ?label) (COUNT (distinct ?contract) as ?count) WHERE {?contract grz-owl:introduces ?master . ?master grz-owl:role/grz-owl:roleType grz-owl:master . ?master grz-owl:profession/grz-owl:standardForm ?profSF . } GROUP BY ?profSF

economics.name: Contract distribution per profession (>100)
economics.query: SELECT (?profSF as ?label) (COUNT (distinct ?contract) as ?count) WHERE {?contract grz-owl:introduces ?master . ?master grz-owl:role/grz-owl:roleType grz-owl:master . ?master grz-owl:profession/grz-owl:standardForm ?profSF . } GROUP BY ?profSF HAVING COUNT (distinct ?contract) >100

economics.name: Contract distribution per profession category
economics.query: SELECT COUNT (distinct ?contract) AS ?count STR(?profCAT) AS ?label WHERE {  ?contract grz-owl:introduces ?master .  ?master grz-owl:role/grz-owl:roleType grz-owl:master .  ?master grz-owl:profession/grz-owl:professionCategory ?profCAT .} GROUP BY ?profCAT

economics.name: Contract distribution per number of guarantor(s)
economics.query: SELECT ?guarCount AS ?label count(distinct ?contract) AS ?count WHERE {SELECT ?contract count(distinct ?guar) AS ?guarCount WHERE { ?contract  a grz-owl:Contract ;  grz-owl:introduces ?guar . ?guar grz-owl:role ?role . ?role grz-owl:roleType  grz-owl:guarantor . } GROUP BY ?contract } ORDER BY ASC(?guarCount)

economics.name: How many apprentices do master have?
economics.query: SELECT  ?numberApp AS ?label COUNT (distinct ?master) AS ?count WHERE { SELECT ?master (COUNT (distinct ?app) AS ?numberApp) WHERE  { ?master grz-owl:has_apprentice ?app . } GROUP BY ?master } ORDER BY ASC (?numberApp)

economics.name: How many apprentices do master in "stampa" have?
economics.query: SELECT  ?numberApp AS ?label COUNT (distinct ?master) AS ?count WHERE {SELECT ?master ?numberApp  WHERE  {SELECT ?master (COUNT (distinct ?app) AS ?numberApp) WHERE  {?master a grz-owl:Person . ?master grz-owl:has_apprentice/grz-owl:value ?app .  ?master grz-owl:profession/grz-owl:value ?lexEntryProf . ?lexEntryProf grz-owl:professionCategory "stampa" . }  GROUP BY ?master  } GROUP BY ?numberApp } ORDER BY ASC (?numberApp)

geographics.name: Workshop distribution per parish
geographics.query: SELECT STR(?l) AS ?label (COUNT (distinct ?wm) as ?count) WHERE {  ?wm a grz-owl:WorkshopMention .  ?wm grz-owl:location/grz-owl:in_parish/rdfs:label ?l . } GROUP BY ?l HAVING COUNT (distinct ?wm) > 10

geographics.name: Workshop distribution per sestriere
geographics.query: SELECT STR(?l) AS ?label (COUNT (distinct ?wm) as ?count) WHERE { ?wm a grz-owl:WorkshopMention . ?wm grz-owl:location/grz-owl:in_sestriere/rdfs:label ?l  . } GROUP BY ?l

geographics.name: Apprentice origin (standard geo name, > 50)
geographics.query: SELECT COUNT(distinct ?app) AS ?count STR(?GeoOriginStandardForm) AS ?label WHERE {  ?app  a grz-owl:PersonMention .  ?app grz-owl:role/grz-owl:roleType  grz-owl:apprentice .  ?app  grz-owl:geographicOrigin/grz-owl:standardForm ?GeoOriginStandardForm . } GROUP BY ?GeoOriginStandardForm HAVING COUNT(distinct ?app) >  50

events.name: Enrolment per week day
events.query: SELECT STR(?day) AS ?label COUNT (?contract) AS ?count WHERE {   ?contract grz-owl:reports ?event .  ?event sem:eventType grz-owl:enrolment .  ?event grz-owl:weekDay ?day .} GROUP BY ?day ORDER BY ASC (?day)
